Sioux_City.Martin Field (Nebraska):
Martin Field (FAA LID: 7K8) is a privately owned, public use airport located three nautical miles (6 km) southwest of the central business district of South Sioux City, in Dakota County, Nebraska, United States.


== Facilities and aircraft ==
Martin Field covers an area of 175 acres (71 ha) at an elevation of 1,100 feet (335 m) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 14/32 with an asphalt surface measuring 3,323 by 50 feet (1,013 x 15 m).
